00024 #ifndef _NIF_CONTROLLED_H_
00025 #define _NIF_CONTROLLED_H_
00026 
00027 #include "extra.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace Nif
00030 {
00031 
00033 class Controlled : public Extra
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   ControllerPtr controller;
00037 
00038   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00039   {
00040     Extra::read(nif);
00041     controller.read(nif);
00042   }
00043 };
00044 
00046 class Named : public Controlled
00047 {
00048 public:
00049   Misc::SString name;
00050 
00051   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00052   {
00053     name = nif->getString();
00054     Controlled::read(nif);
00055   }
00056 };
00057 typedef Named NiSequenceStreamHelper;
00058 
00059 class NiParticleGrowFade : public Controlled
00060 {
00061 public:
00062   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00063   {
00064     Controlled::read(nif);
00065 
00066     // Two floats.
00067     nif->skip(8);
00068   }
00069 };
00070 
00071 class NiParticleColorModifier : public Controlled
00072 {
00073 public:
00074   NiColorDataPtr data;
00075 
00076   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00077   {
00078     Controlled::read(nif);
00079     data.read(nif);
00080   }
00081 };
00082 
00083 class NiGravity : public Controlled
00084 {
00085 public:
00086   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00087   {
00088     Controlled::read(nif);
00089 
00090     // two floats, one int, six floats
00091     nif->skip(9*4);
00092   }
00093 };
00094 
00095 // NiPinaColada
00096 class NiPlanarCollider : public Controlled
00097 {
00098 public:
00099   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00100   {
00101     Controlled::read(nif);
00102 
00103     // (I think) 4 floats + 4 vectors
00104     nif->skip(4*16);
00105   }
00106 };
00107 
00108 class NiParticleRotation : public Controlled
00109 {
00110 public:
00111   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00112   {
00113     Controlled::read(nif);
00114 
00115     /*
00116       byte (0 or 1)
00117       float (1)
00118       float*3
00119      */
00120     nif->skip(17);
00121   }
00122 };
